I guess it’s not possible for only a few people

to change everyone

after all.

You all stay here and start a new life.

Yes, sir.

Let’s go, there’s nothing more we can do here.

Before long, the natives who had been educated in England returned to their previous lifestyle. FitzRoy’s experiment had been an utter failure.

I had hoped there would be

a positive result.

On June 10, 1834, after traveling

around the Atlantic Ocean for two years, the Beagle turned its sails toward the Pacific Ocean.
